title: Dragon-Marked War God - Novel Updates

tags: Alchemy   Arrogant Characters   Artifacts   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Body Tempering   Buddhism   Cheats   Comedic Undertone   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Demons   Dragons   Early Romance   Fast Cultivation   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Heavenly Tribulation   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Long Separations   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Mythical Beasts   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Pill Based Cultivation   Pill Concocting   Polygamy   Previous Life Talent   Race Change   Reincarnation   Revenge   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Soul Power   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sword Wielder   Transformation Ability   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong

description:
The once greatest Saint underneath the heavens has been reborn after one hundred years. He cultivates with mighty skills, and he fights to once again reach the top of the world!

Don’t compete with me when it comes to concocting pills, 100% effectiveness means nothing to me.

Don’t compete with me when it comes to cultivation speed, I won’t be responsible when you die from embarrassment.

Don’t compete with me when it comes to experience, as I’m an ancient ancestor.

The existence of Jiang Chen is destined to ridicule thousands of geniuses……>
